active_skill.en_text: Change all orbs to Water, Light, and Heal orbs; Change own Att. to Light for 3 turns

jp_skill.name: あまねく光る遊星
jp_skill.raw_description: 全ドロップを水、光、回復ドロップに変化。 3ターンの間、自分の属性が光属性に変化。

kr_skill.name: 하늘에서 빛나는 유성
kr_skill.raw_description: 모든 드롭을 물, 빛, 회복드롭으로 변화 3턴 동안 자신의 속성이 빛속성으로 변화

na_skill.name: Astronomical Incandescence
na_skill.raw_description: Changes all Orbs to Water, Light & Heal Orbs; this ally's Att. changes to Light for 3 turns

en_as_text: Change all orbs to Water, Light, and Heal orbs; Change own Att. to Light for 3 turns
en_ls_text: 6x ATK for Light Att.; 2x RCV for Water Att.; 1.5x ATK when matching 5 or more connected Light orbs up to 3x at 8 orbs

params: 1ターンの間、11コンボ以下の攻撃を吸収

behavior._name: Mikoshi Dedicated to the Sky God
params: Absorbs attacks of 11 combos or fewer for 1 turn

leader_skill.name: 始原の天象
leader_skill.raw_description: 光属性の攻撃力が6倍、水属性の回復力が2倍。 光を5個以上つなげて消すと攻撃力が上昇、最大3倍。
